function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sewage samples positive for SARS-CoV-2 RNA","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and potential transmission through sewage","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough disinfection of sewage and implementation of advanced treatment methods","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies for sewage treatment","People":"Public and workers in sewage treatment facilities","Owner":"Sewage treatment management and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Viral shedding in stool as a potential route of transmission","Impact":"Risk of transmission through stool specimens","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and sanitation measures, and consider testing and monitoring stool samples","Technologies":"Advanced sanitation methods and regular testing of stool samples","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and individuals in close contact with COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Healthcare facilities and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Contamination in field-settings with SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Risk of environmental contamination and potential transmission in field-settings","Mitigation":"Regular environmental cleaning and disinfection, and implementation of personal protective measures","Technologies":"Advanced environmental cleaning and disinfection technologies","People":"Individuals in field-settings and public spaces","Owner":"Public health authorities and organizations"}]}
